description:
In this course titled 'Hypnosis-Improve Weak Bone Health Using Self Hypnosis' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

What is Osteoporosis?

  • 1) Osteoporosis is excessive bone porosity or tissue reduction caused by loss of minerals in the bone substance. 2) It is a progressive disease that causes weakness in the bones and bone structure, which makes bone fractures more likely to happen. 3) Women are more likely to have osteoporosis than men. 2. How Self Hypnosis Can Help? 1) Self hypnosis helps accelerates your healing process 2) Self hypnosis helps maintain positive attitude 3) Self Hypnosis helps you to relax and calm down 4) Self hypnosis treats stress, anxiety, nervousness and depression successfully
  • Self hypnosis treats stress, anxiety, nervousness and depression successfully

It is for those men and women who are suffering from weak bone condition in their body and are unable to get rid of the problems mentally and physically.

It is ideal for everyone who want to heal their general health,improve their mental health and improve their weak bone condition.

This course contains a lot of exercises and more than 30 minutes of live video content designed over 8 lectures in English including bonuses.

This course contains-

Lecture 1: Introduction

Lecture 2: Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture 3: Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture 4: How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture 5: How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture 6: Guided Visualization Exercise: To Improve Weak Bone Condition

Lecture 7: Summary

Lecture 8: Bonus Exercise - Affirmations For Depression, Stress, Insomnia And Negativity
title: Hypnosis-Improve Weak Bone Health Using Self Hypnosis
